title: Review a Phase I Environmental Report
description: As part of due diligence for a land purchase, a client has received a Phase I Environmental Site Assessment. The agent needs to review it.

tasks.description: Receive the Phase I ESA report.
Scan the report's executive summary for any 'Recognized Environmental Conditions' (RECs).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the report identifies a potential REC related to a former gas station nearby.

tasks.description: Advise the client on the findings and recommend they proceed with a Phase II investigation as suggested in the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the risk and the recommended next step.
